CHAT.comment: DOLE FOOD COMPANY, ET AL., Petitioners v. GERARDO DENNIS PATRICKSON, ET AL. and DEAD SEA BROMINE CO. LTD., AND BROMINE COMPOUNDS LIMITED Petitioners, v. GERARDO DENNIS PATRICKSON, ET AL.
The above-entitled matters came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:07 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PETER R. PADEN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JONATHAN S. MASSEY ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY P. MINEAR ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF PETER R. PADEN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, [*55] at 11:06 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
